name: Instructions
entries: Be concise. Write only 2-3 sentences max.
Use whatever tense the story does. If it uses second person (you/your) make sure to use second person. If it uses third person then use that.
Never tell what the player does, let them decide.
Continue the story from where it left off.

name: Hovercar (aka floatie)
entry: A cyberpunk car that can fly in any elevation, although it has a limited battery and the higher you go the faster it depletes.
